lead_paragraph: A late goal from Salomon Rondon secured  West Bromwich Albion a 1-1 draw at Stoke City on Saturday and provided Tony Pulis with plenty to celebrate in his 1,000th game as a manager.

headline.print_headline: Last-Gasp Rondon Sparks Pulis Celebrations for West Brom
headline.main: Last-Gasp Rondon Sparks Pulis Celebrations for West Brom

snippet: A late goal from Salomon Rondon secured  West Bromwich Albion a 1-1 draw at Stoke City on Saturday and provided Tony Pulis with plenty to celebrate in his 1,000th game as a manager....
